Posts.Content: mshubba wrote: Hi, where do I start?  I am 32 yrs old.  My grandmother and aunt had breast cancer.  My 6 yr. old son is in remission from cancer.  Here is my worry. I went in to see my doctor a month ago when I found a soft lump under my left breast where my bra wire runs.  She did an ultra sound and it was fine.  I went back  last week do to it was still there and hurting me.  I had a CT scan with and with out contrast.  The spot on my left side was nothing but they found other things.  They found round nodular structure anterior to the spleen measuring 17 mm, an astymmetric nodularity in the inferior lateral aspect of the right breast of 1 mm ( arm pit area), a 2.5 cm cyst in the right ovari that is a ovarian cyst and sub-cm hypodensity in the dome of the right lobe of the liver that is likely a hepatic cyst.  I have ultra sound tomorrow on my liver and ovary and a mammo on 12-30-08.  What do you think?  Any advice or comments?  Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: mshubba wrote: I need some help with what is going on with all the tests I have been doing to find out what is really under my armpit.  I had a CT scan done and it found a mass under my arm pit that is 1cm.  They also found a cyst in my overaries and on my liver.  I had a ultrasound done on my liver and ovary and it should nothing.  I had a mammo done and it came back ok.  I spoke with a differnt dr. and he wants me to have a MRI done to make sure about the mass udner my arm pit.  Is this normal to have all this done?  I can feel the mass.  The way the physican told me were it was is in the lower outer right breast in 8/9 o'clock area.  I just would like to get a straight answer.  the second dr. told me that the mammo may not have gotten a good view of it in that area.  Please Help Log in to post a reply
